content: the court of appeals rejected the appeal made by drs and dra against the nonfinal judgment of the court of pistoia however their appeal against the final judgment was partially accepted and dmbw and drs were ordered to pay a sum of money the court also declared that the claim for restitution of fruits from the hereditary property was not allowed the court confirmed the setoff of costs between the parties and ordered the appellants to pay the costs of the appeal the court mentioned that a previous judgment had already ruled on the hereditary division case and rejected the claims made by dmbw for collation and restitution of assets the court determined the respective claims of the heirs and ordered the debtors to pay the amounts plus legal interest the court rejected the remarks made by de and accepted the valuations and conclusions made by the consultant the court also declared that the parties were fully compensated for the costs of litigation the appellants appealed the judgment arguing that the starting date of interest and the compensation for litigation expenses were not properly addressed as well as claiming a material error in the calculations the court observed that the appeal was filed late and concluded that the division judgment could be closed either by a judgment or by the approval of a division project the court addressed the issue of the starting date of interest and concluded that it should be calculated from the date of the opening of the succession the court modified the final judgment accordingly and ordered the appellants to reimburse the costs of the appeal
